name: Regaldor
description: Regaldor is a majestic pokemon with a regal mask adorning its face. It can often be found inhabiting mountain-like environments, where it spends its days lounging atop mountain peaks and soaring through the air. With its signature Eterna Beam and Dragon Breath abilities, this pokemon is a powerful ally to have by your side. Not to be messed with, it is best to admire this awe-inspiring pokemon from a distance.
image_prompt: Regaldor::0 a mythical dragon-type serpent pokemon::2.5, wearing a regal mask, in a mountain environment, orange and blue ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
